Class SpaceGameServer

java.lang.Object
  SpaceGameServer

public class SpaceGameServer
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
bachmaer SpaceGameServer. Implements a server to support a multiuser game in which clients maneuver spacecraft through a shared virtual world and attempt to destroy each other by either firing torpedoes or ramming. The servers is the arbiter of all events resulting in the destruction of a torpedo or a spacecraft and generates messages for removal accordingly. Removal information is sent via TCP. UDP update messages that are received from clients are forwarded to all other clients.

Constructor Detail

SpaceGameServer

public SpaceGameServer()
Server constructor. Create data members to use for tracking and updating game information. Create obstacles. Create and start GUI. Start threads and tasks.

Method Detail

createObstacles

protected void createObstacles()
Create a number of obstacles as determined by a value held in Constants.NUMBER_OF_OBSTACLES. Obstacles are in random positions and are shared by all clients.

close

public void close()
Causes all threads and timer tasks to cease execution and closes all sockets.

sendRemove

protected void sendRemove(SpaceCraft sc)
Sends remove information for a particular SpaceCraft of Torpedo to all clients. Each client maintains a Socket with which it only listens for this remove information.

Parameters:
sc - ship to be removed

sendTorpedoUpdate

protected void sendTorpedoUpdate(Torpedo sc,
                                 java.net.DatagramSocket dgSock)
Creates a update message for a torpedo and sends it to all clients.

Parameters:
sc - torpedo being updated
dgSock - socket to use to send the message

selectiveForward

protected void selectiveForward(java.net.DatagramPacket fwdPack,
                                java.net.InetSocketAddress notSendTo,
                                java.net.DatagramSocket dgSock)
Sends a datagram packet to all clients except one as specified by an input argument.

Parameters:
fwdPack - packet to send
notSendTo - address to skip
dgSock - socket to use to send the message

allForward

protected void allForward(java.net.DatagramPacket fwdPack,
                          java.net.DatagramSocket dgSock)
Sends a datagram packet to all clients.
